articles.title: Modi visits White House to talk trade after Trump reveals new tariff plan - BBC.com
articles.description: Trump says India, and other countries, will be charged with the "same tariffs they charge us" under his plan.
articles.content:
Soutik BiswasIndia Correspondent
PM Modis visit to the White House comes at a complex moment, as his "Make in India" manufacturing push at home meets Trumps "America First" doctrine.
Unlike their w… [+922 chars]
